Symbol.Script_3D:
!-----------3d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_3D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat, gs_InsMat, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
! Duct Nested Fitting
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
PEN gs_cont_pen MATERIAL gs_DuctMat
XFORM MEP_Position[2][1], MEP_Position[3][1], dZx, MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[2][2], MEP_Position[3][2], dZy, MEP_Position[1][2], MEP_Position[2][3], MEP_Position[3][3], dZz, MEP_Position[1][3]
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100 hceID_2 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+200 hceID_3 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+300 hceID_4 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+400
HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1, hceID_1 HOTSPOT ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2, hceID_2 HOTSPOT ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3, hceID_3 IF NOT(typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_1) AND NOT(typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_2) THEN HOTSPOT ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4, hceID_4
ROTy 90
thick = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]*8
IF GLOB_CONTEXT > 40 AND GLOB_CONTEXT < 50 THEN addStatus = 3 ELSE addStatus = 0
hID = 1 IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_1 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 THEN IF not(show_axis) THEN PLANE 4, ductHalfHeightA-EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength, -ductHalfHeightA+EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength, -ductHalfHeightA+EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength-thick, ductHalfHeightA-EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength-thick
HOTSPOT 0, -ConWidth_1/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_2, 1+128: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -ConWidth_1/2-1, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_2, 3: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_2, 2: hID = hID+1 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_2 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 THEN IF not(show_axis) THEN PLANE 4, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_2, ductHalfWidthA-EPS, MEP_StraightLength, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_2, -ductHalfWidthA+EPS, MEP_StraightLength, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_2, -ductHalfWidthA+EPS, MEP_StraightLength-thick, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_2, ductHalfWidthA-EPS, MEP_StraightLength-thick
HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2, 0, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_2, 1+128: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2-1, 0, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_2, 3: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_2, 0, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_2, 2: hID = hID+1 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 THEN IF not(show_axis) THEN PLANE 4, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_2+EPS, MEP_StraightLength, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, ductHalfWidthA-EPS, MEP_StraightLength, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, ductHalfWidthA-EPS, MEP_StraightLength-thick, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_2+EPS, MEP_StraightLength-thick
HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_3/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_3, 1+128: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2-1, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_3/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_3, 3: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_3/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_3, 2: hID = hID+1 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_4 THEN IF not(show_axis) THEN PLANE 4, ductHalfHeightA-EPS, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength, -ductHalfHeightA+EPS, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength, -ductHalfHeightA+EPS, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength-thick, ductHalfHeightA-EPS, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength-thick
IF not(show_axis) THEN PLANE 4, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_2-EPS, MEP_StraightLength, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, -ductHalfWidthA+EPS, MEP_StraightLength, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, -ductHalfWidthA+EPS, MEP_StraightLength-thick, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_2-EPS, MEP_StraightLength-thick
HOTSPOT 0, ConWidth_1/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_2, 1+128: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT 0, ConWidth_1/2+1, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_2, 3: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT 0, ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_2, 2: hID = hID+1
HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_3, 1+128: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2-1, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_3, 3: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_3, 2: hID = hID+1 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 THEN IF not(show_axis) THEN PLANE 4, ductHalfHeightA-EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_2+EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength, -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_2+EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength-thick, ductHalfHeightA-EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength-thick
HOTSPOT ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_3/2, -ConWidth_1/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_3, 1+128: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_3/2, -ConWidth_1/2-1, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_3, 3: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_3/2, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_3, 2: hID = hID+1 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_6 THEN IF not(show_axis) THEN PLANE 4, ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_2, ductHalfWidthA-EPS, MEP_StraightLength, ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_2, -ductHalfWidthA+EPS, MEP_StraightLength, ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_2, -ductHalfWidthA+EPS, MEP_StraightLength-thick, ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_2, ductHalfWidthA-EPS, MEP_StraightLength-thick
IF not(show_axis) THEN PLANE 4, ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_2-EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength, -ductHalfHeightA+EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength, -ductHalfHeightA+EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength-thick, ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_2-EPS, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength-thick
HOTSPOT ConDepth_1/2, 0, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_2, 1+128: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT ConDepth_1/2+1, 0, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_2, 3: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_2, 0, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConDepth_2, 2: hID = hID+1
HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3/2, -ConWidth_1/2, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_3, 1+128: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3/2, -ConWidth_1/2-1, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_3, 3: hID = hID+1 HOTSPOT -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3/2, -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3, MEP_StraightLength, hID, ConWidth_3, 2: hID = hID+1 ENDIF ENDIF
IF duct_show and not(show_axis) THEN ! -----> duct flanges <----- ! MATERIAL gs_DuctMat
IF flangeA THEN length = connectorLengthA halfWidth = ductHalfWidthA halfHeight = ductHalfHeightA halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthA halfHeightC = connectorHalfHeightA
GOSUB 200+shapeTypeA ENDIF
ADDz connectorLengthA
ww = ductHalfWidthA: dd = ductHalfHeightA
PUT dd, ww, 0 PUT -dd, ww, 0 PUT -dd, -ww, 0 PUT dd, -ww, 0
mm = MEP_StraightLength-connectorLengthA-connectorLengthB
PUT dd, ww, mm PUT -dd, ww, mm PUT -dd, -ww, mm PUT dd, -ww, mm
RULED NSP/6, addStatus+4+16+32,
GET(NSP)
DEL 1
ENDIF
IF MEP_InsShow and show_isol and not(show_axis) THEN ! -----> insulation <----- ! MATERIAL gs_InsMat
ductInsHalfWidthA = ductHalfWidthA+MEP_InsThickness ductInsHalfHeightA = ductHalfHeightA+MEP_InsThickness
ww = ductInsHalfWidthA: dd = ductInsHalfHeightA
PUT dd, ww, 0 PUT -dd, ww, 0 PUT -dd, -ww, 0 PUT dd, -ww, 0
PUT dd, ww, MEP_StraightLength PUT -dd, ww, MEP_StraightLength PUT -dd, -ww, MEP_StraightLength PUT dd, -ww, MEP_StraightLength
RULED NSP/6, addStatus+4+16+32,
GET(NSP) ENDIF
DEL 2
END
201: PRISM_ 10, length, halfHeightC, halfWidthC, 15, -halfHeightC, halfWidthC, 15, -halfHeightC, -halfWidthC, 15, halfHeightC, -halfWidthC, 15, halfHeightC, halfWidthC, -1, halfHeight, halfWidth, 15, -halfHeight, halfWidth, 15, -halfHeight, -halfWidth, 15, halfHeight, -halfWidth, 15, halfHeight, halfWidth, -1 RETURN
202: PRISM_ 4, length, 0, 0, 979, halfWidthC, 360, 4079, 0, 0, 979, halfWidth, 360, 4079 RETURN
203: IF ABS(halfWidth-halfHeight) < EPS THEN PRISM_ 4, length, 0, 0, 979, halfWidthC, 360, 4079, 0, 0, 979, halfWidth, 360, 4079 ENDIF IF NOT(ABS(halfWidth-halfHeight) < EPS) AND halfWidth > halfHeight THEN rrC = halfHeightC rr = halfHeight PRISM_ 12, length, halfHeightC, -halfWidthC+rrC, 79, halfHeightC, halfWidthC-rrC, 79, -halfHeightC, halfWidthC-rrC, 1079, -halfHeightC, -halfWidthC+rrC, 79, halfHeightC, -halfWidthC+rrC, 1079, halfHeightC, -halfWidthC+rrC, -1, halfHeight, -halfWidth+rr, 79, halfHeight, halfWidth-rr, 79, -halfHeight, halfWidth-rr, 1079, -halfHeight, -halfWidth+rr, 79, halfHeight, -halfWidth+rr, 1079, halfHeight, -halfWidth+rr, -1 ENDIF IF NOT(ABS(halfWidth-halfHeight) < EPS) AND halfWidth < halfHeight THEN rrC = halfWidthC rr = halfWidth PRISM_ 12, length, halfHeightC-rrC, halfWidthC, 79, -halfHeightC+rrC, halfWidthC, 79, -halfHeightC+rrC, -halfWidthC, 1079, halfHeightC-rrC, -halfWidthC, 79, halfHeightC-rrC, halfWidthC, 1079, halfHeightC-rrC, halfWidthC, -1, halfHeight-rr, halfWidth, 79, -halfHeight+rr, halfWidth, 79, -halfHeight+rr, -halfWidth, 1079, halfHeight-rr, -halfWidth, 79, halfHeight-rr, halfWidth, 1079, halfHeight-rr, halfWidth, -1 ENDIF RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
!-----------2d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_2D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, MEP_cline_type, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
IF ABS(MEP_Position[3][3]) < EPS OR ABS(MEP_Position[2][3]) < EPS THEN ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] ROT2 dirAng
IF connectedA + connectedB < 1 + EPS THEN unID = 1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, MEP_StraightLength, 1+256*(connectedA < EPS): unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, MEP_StraightLength, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 MEP_StraightLength, 0, unID, MEP_StraightLength, 2+128*connectedB: unID=unID+1 ENDIF
DEL 2 ENDIF
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100 hceID_2 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+200 hceID_3 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+300 hceID_4 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+400
ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] HOTSPOT2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], hceID_1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2], hceID_2 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[7][1], outCoords[7][2], hceID_3 DEL 1
IF NOT(typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_1) AND NOT(typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_2) THEN HOTSPOT2 outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2], hceID_4
IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen if not(show_axis) then PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2
PEN gs_cont_pen if not(show_axis) then PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2+32, 2+8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2
IF MEP_InsShow and show_isol and not(show_axis) THEN PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2+32, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 0, MEP_InsShow = 1, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2
Symbol.Script_1D:
!-----------Основной--------------------- success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis", show_axis) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis_and", show_axis_and) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_isol", show_isol) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_conventions", show_conventions) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_size", show_size) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_2D_m",gs_detlevel_2D_m) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_3D_m", gs_detlevel_3D_m) call "Показ_систем" PARAMETERS All isMep=1 RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el, syst_name
! Duct Nested Fitting
EPS = 0.0001
DIM type_dim[6] type_dim[1]=`2-1` type_dim[2]=`2-2` type_dim[3]=`3-1` type_dim[4]=`3-2` type_dim[5]=`3-3` type_dim[6]=`3-4`
CONNTYPE_ID_1 = 1 CONNTYPE_ID_2 = 2 CONNTYPE_ID_3 = 3 CONNTYPE_ID_4 = 4 CONNTYPE_ID_5 = 5 CONNTYPE_ID_6 = 6
ductHalfWidthA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] ductHalfHeightA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorLengthA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorHalfWidthA = ductHalfWidthA+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] connectorHalfHeightA = ductHalfHeightA+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] connectedA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][18] shapeTypeA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21]
connectedB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18] shapeTypeB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21]
connectedC = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][18] IF connectedC > EPS THEN connectedB = 1
IF ABS(MEP_Position[2][1]) < EPS THEN IF SGN(MEP_Position[2][2]) = 1 THEN dirAng = 90 IF SGN(MEP_Position[2][2]) = -1 THEN dirAng = 270 ELSE dirAng = ATN(MEP_Position[2][2]/MEP_Position[2][1]) IF SGN(MEP_Position[2][1]) = -1 AND SGN(MEP_Position[2][2]) = 1 THEN dirAng = 180+dirAng IF SGN(MEP_Position[2][1]) = -1 AND SGN(MEP_Position[2][2]) = -1 THEN dirAng = 180+dirAng IF SGN(MEP_Position[2][1]) = 1 AND SGN(MEP_Position[2][2]) = -1 THEN dirAng = 360+dirAng IF SGN(MEP_Position[2][1]) = 1 AND ABS(MEP_Position[2][2]) < EPS THEN dirAng = 0 IF SGN(MEP_Position[2][1]) = -1 AND ABS(MEP_Position[2][2]) < EPS THEN dirAng = 180 ENDIF
connectedD = 0 IF NOT(typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_1) AND NOT(typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_2) THEN connectedD = MEP_NumConnectionData[4][18] IF connectedD > EPS THEN connectedB = 1
flangeA = 1 IF MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] < EPS OR ABS(gs_AddConnections[1][1] - 1) < EPS THEN flangeA = 0 connectorLengthA = 0 ENDIF
flangeB = 1 IF MEP_NumConnectionData[2][15] < EPS OR ABS(gs_AddConnections[2][1] - 1) < EPS THEN flangeB = 0 connectorLengthB = 0 ENDIF
IF MEP_StraightLength < EPS THEN MEP_StraightLength = EPS PARAMETERS MEP_StraightLength = MEP_StraightLength ENDIF
! ---------------- ! ! --- Z vector --- ! ! ---------------- !
dZx = -MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][3]+MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][2] dZy = -MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][1]+MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][3] dZz = -MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][2]+MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][1]
!!! +++ Transformational Matrix +++ !!!
DIM tMatrix[3][3]
tMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] tMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] tMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]
tMatrix[2][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] tMatrix[2][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] tMatrix[2][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]
tMatrix[3][1] = dZx tMatrix[3][2] = dZy tMatrix[3][3] = dZz
!!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!!
PUT ConPosX_1+gs_Connections[1][4]*ConLength_1, ConPosY_1+gs_Connections[1][5]*ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1+gs_Connections[1][6]*ConLength_1 PUT gs_Connections[1][4], gs_Connections[1][5], gs_Connections[1][6] PUT gs_Connections[1][7], gs_Connections[1][8], gs_Connections[1][9]
PUT ConPosX_2+gs_Connections[2][4]*ConLength_2, ConPosY_2+gs_Connections[2][5]*ConLength_2, ConPosZ_2+gs_Connections[2][6]*ConLength_2 PUT gs_Connections[2][4], gs_Connections[2][5], gs_Connections[2][6] PUT gs_Connections[2][7], gs_Connections[2][8], gs_Connections[2][9]
PUT ConPosX_3+gs_Connections[3][4]*ConLength_3, ConPosY_3+gs_Connections[3][5]*ConLength_3, ConPosZ_3+gs_Connections[3][6]*ConLength_3 PUT gs_Connections[3][4], gs_Connections[3][5], gs_Connections[3][6] PUT gs_Connections[3][7], gs_Connections[3][8], gs_Connections[3][9]
PUT ConPosX_4+gs_Connections[4][4]*ConLength_4, ConPosY_4+gs_Connections[4][5]*ConLength_4, ConPosZ_4+gs_Connections[4][6]*ConLength_4 PUT gs_Connections[4][4], gs_Connections[4][5], gs_Connections[4][6] PUT gs_Connections[4][7], gs_Connections[4][8], gs_Connections[4][9]
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3] NEXT cnum
z = MEP_Position[1][3] + MEP_Position[2][3]*(MEP_StraightLength/2) PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_set_str[6][2] ui_set_str[1][1] = "(A) "+`Длина` ui_set_str[2][1] = "(B) "+`Ширина Внутри` ui_set_str[3][1] = "(C) "+`Высота Внутри` ui_set_str[4][1] = `Изоляция` ui_set_str[5][1] = `Толщина` ui_set_str[6][1] = `Тип`
ui_set_str[1][2] = "MEP_StraightLength" ui_set_str[2][2] = "ConWidth_1" ui_set_str[3][2] = "ConDepth_1" ui_set_str[4][2] = "MEP_InsShow" ui_set_str[5][2] = "MEP_InsThickness" ui_set_str[6][2] = ""
DIM ui_set_attr[8][9] FOR i = 2 TO 8 FOR j = 1 TO 9 ui_set_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_set_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[1][2] = 3 ui_set_attr[1][3] = 220 ui_set_attr[1][4] = 50 ui_set_attr[1][5] = 127 ui_set_attr[1][6] = 90 ui_set_attr[1][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[1][8] = 128 ui_set_attr[1][9] = 23
ui_set_attr[5][3] = 1
ui_set_attr[7][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[7][2] = 1 ui_set_attr[7][3] = 15 ui_set_attr[7][4] = 181 ui_set_attr[7][5] = 63 ui_set_attr[7][6] = 65 ui_set_attr[7][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[7][8] = 0 ui_set_attr[7][9] = 23
DIM ui_vis_attr[6][5] FOR i = 1 TO 6 FOR j = 1 TO 5 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 4 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 6 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][5] = 4
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_sep_attr[2][5] ui_sep_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_sep_attr[1][2] = 200 ui_sep_attr[1][3] = 44 ui_sep_attr[1][4] = 200 ui_sep_attr[1][5] = 251
ui_sep_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_sep_attr[2][2] = 15 ui_sep_attr[2][3] = 172 ui_sep_attr[2][4] = 190 ui_sep_attr[2][5] = 172
DIM ui_con_type[4] ui_con_type[1] = 1 ui_con_type[2] = 1 ui_con_type[3] = 1 ui_con_type[4] = 1
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 4 ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 0 IF MEP_InsShow THEN ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 0 ELSE ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 4 ENDIF ENDIF
IF MEP_InsShow THEN ui_set_attr[6][2] = 0 ELSE ui_set_attr[6][2] = 4 ENDIF
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_set_str = ui_set_str, ui_set_attr = ui_set_attr, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_sep_attr = ui_sep_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 1
setPage = 1 ui_cur_page = 0 FOR j = 1 TO VARDIM1(ui_page_idx) IF ui_page_idx[j] = setPage THEN ui_cur_page = j NEXT j
IF ABS(gs_ui_current_page - ui_cur_page) < EPS THEN UI_PAGE gs_ui_current_page
UI_PICT 1, 38, 43, 126, 120, 1
UI_INFIELD{3} "typeID", 70, 181, 120, 70, 2, 2, 6, 3, 120, 70, 100, 60, 1, type_dim[1], CONNTYPE_ID_1, 2, type_dim[2], CONNTYPE_ID_2, 3, type_dim[3], CONNTYPE_ID_3, 4, type_dim[4], CONNTYPE_ID_4, 5, type_dim[5], CONNTYPE_ID_5, 6, type_dim[6], CONNTYPE_ID_6 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Duct Nested Fitting
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 1 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 0 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
VALUES "MEP_StraightLength" RANGE (0, ] VALUES "MEP_InsThickness" RANGE(0, ]
VALUES{2} "typeID" CONNTYPE_ID_1, type_dim[1], CONNTYPE_ID_2, type_dim[2], CONNTYPE_ID_3, type_dim[3], CONNTYPE_ID_4, type_dim[4], CONNTYPE_ID_5, type_dim[5], CONNTYPE_ID_6, type_dim[6]
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN LOCK "gs_DuctMat", "gs_InsMat" IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN LOCK "useSysMat"
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_1 THEN MEP_NumberConnections = 3 IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_2 THEN MEP_NumberConnections = 3 IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 THEN MEP_NumberConnections = 4 IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_4 THEN MEP_NumberConnections = 4 IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 THEN MEP_NumberConnections = 4 IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_6 THEN MEP_NumberConnections = 4
IF MEP_NumberConnections < 4 THEN ConStatus_4 = 0 PARAMETERS ConStatus_4 = ConStatus_4 ELSE ConStatus_4 = 1 PARAMETERS ConStatus_4 = ConStatus_4 ENDIF
gs_ui = 1
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Основной`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_1 < EPS THEN ConWidth_1 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0,]
IF ConDepth_1 < EPS THEN ConDepth_1 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0,]
IF ConWallThickness_1 < 0 THEN ConWallThickness_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_1 = ConWallThickness_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConWallThickness_1" RANGE [0,]
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[1][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_1 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_1 = ConLength_1 ConPosX_1 = ConLength_1 PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1 ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = ConPosY_1 ConPosZ_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_1
LOCK "ConStatus_1" ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, gs_ui = gs_ui, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][3] = "0"
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN ConWallThickness_2 = ConWallThickness_1 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_2 = ConWallThickness_2 ConWallThickness_3 = ConWallThickness_1 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_3 = ConWallThickness_3 ConWallThickness_4 = ConWallThickness_1 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_4 = ConWallThickness_4
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "typeID" THEN IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_1 THEN ConWidth_2 = (ConWidth_1)/2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_2 THEN ConDepth_2 = (ConDepth_1)/2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_4 THEN ConWidth_2 = (ConWidth_1)/2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_4
ConDepth_3 = (ConDepth_1)/2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_4 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_6 THEN ConWidth_3 = (ConWidth_1)/2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_3 PARAMETERS ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_4
ConDepth_2 = (ConDepth_1)/2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_4 ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Патрубок 1`
ConDVecX = 1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_1 PARAMETERS ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2 MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2]
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_1 THEN VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE [0.001, ConWidth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_3" THEN ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_3 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ENDIF
ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 LOCK "ConDepth_2"
ConPosY_2 = -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_2/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2 ConPosZ_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_2 THEN VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE [0.001, ConDepth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_3" THEN ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ENDIF
ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_1 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 LOCK "ConWidth_2"
ConPosY_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2
ConPosZ_2 = ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_2/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_4 THEN VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE [0.001, ConWidth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_3" THEN ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_3 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_3 PARAMETERS ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_4 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_4" THEN ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_4 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_4 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ENDIF
ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 LOCK "ConDepth_2"
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 THEN ConPosY_2 = -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_2/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_4 THEN ConPosY_2 = ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_2/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2 ENDIF ConPosZ_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_6 THEN VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE [0.001, ConDepth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_3" THEN ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_4 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_4" THEN ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_4 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_4 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF
ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_1 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 LOCK "ConWidth_2"
ConPosY_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 THEN ConPosZ_2 = ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_2/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_6 THEN ConPosZ_2 = -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_2/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF ENDIF
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[2][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_2 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_2 = ConLength_2 ConPosX_2 = MEP_StraightLength-ConLength_2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_2
LOCK "ConStatus_2" ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, gs_ui = gs_ui, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][3] = "0"
! --- 3rd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Патрубок 2`
ConDVecX = 1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_1 PARAMETERS ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3 MEP_StrConnectionData[3][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[3][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[3][2]
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_1 THEN VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE [0.001, ConWidth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_2" THEN ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ENDIF
ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 LOCK "ConDepth_3"
ConPosY_3 = ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = ConPosY_3 ConPosZ_3 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = ConPosZ_3 ENDIF
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_2 THEN VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE [0.001, ConDepth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_2" THEN ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF
ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_1 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 LOCK "ConWidth_3"
ConPosY_3 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = ConPosY_3
ConPosZ_3 = -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = ConPosZ_3 ENDIF
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_4 THEN VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE [0.001, ConWidth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_2" THEN ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ENDIF
VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE [0.001, ConDepth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_4" THEN ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_4 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 THEN ConPosY_3 = ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = ConPosY_3 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_4 THEN ConPosY_3 = -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = ConPosY_3 ENDIF ConPosZ_3 = ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = ConPosZ_3 ENDIF
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_6 THEN VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE [0.001, ConDepth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_2" THEN ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_4 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_4" THEN ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_4 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_4 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF
VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE [0.001, ConWidth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_4" THEN ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_4 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ENDIF
ConPosY_3 = -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = ConPosY_3
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 THEN ConPosZ_3 = -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = ConPosZ_3 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_6 THEN ConPosZ_3 = ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = ConPosZ_3 ENDIF ENDIF
ConLength_3 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_3 = ConLength_3 ConPosX_3 = MEP_StraightLength-ConLength_3 PARAMETERS ConPosX_3 = ConPosX_3
LOCK "ConStatus_3" ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, gs_ui = gs_ui, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][3] = "0"
! ------------------- ! ! --- calculation --- ! ! ------------------- !
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 1) < EPS THEN gs_list_area = (MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] + MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13])*2*MEP_StraightLength PARAMETERS gs_list_area = gs_list_area ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN gs_list_area = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]*PI*MEP_StraightLength PARAMETERS gs_list_area = gs_list_area ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 3) < EPS THEN gs_list_area = ((MIN(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12], MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]))*PI+ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]-MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13])*2)*MEP_StraightLength PARAMETERS gs_list_area = gs_list_area ENDIF
IF MEP_NumberConnections < 4 THEN HIDEPARAMETER "ConNominalWidth_4", "ConNominalDepth_4", "ConWidth_4", "ConDepth_4", "ConLength_4", "ConWallThickness_4", "ConConnectorWidth_4", "ConConnectorDepth_4", "ConConnectorWidth2_4", "ConSystem_4", "ConToolType_4", "ConType_4", "ConStatus_4", "ConConnectorType_4", "ConPosX_4", "ConPosY_4", "ConPosZ_4"
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 4 PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[4][22] = 0 PARAMETERS gs_AddConnections[4][22] = 0 GOTO 1000 ENDIF
! --- 4th CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 4 ConName = `Патрубок 3`
ConDVecX = 1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_1 PARAMETERS ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4 MEP_StrConnectionData[4][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[4][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[4][2]
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_4 THEN VALUES "ConWidth_4" RANGE [0.001, ConWidth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_2" THEN ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_4 ENDIF
VALUES "ConDepth_4" RANGE [0.001, ConDepth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_3" THEN ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_4 ENDIF
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_3 THEN ConPosY_4 = ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_4 = ConPosY_4 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_4 THEN ConPosY_4 = -ConWidth_1/2+ConWidth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_4 = ConPosY_4 ENDIF
ConPosZ_4 = -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4 = ConPosZ_4 ENDIF
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 OR typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_6 THEN VALUES "ConDepth_4" RANGE [0.001, ConDepth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_2" THEN ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_4 ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_4 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_3" THEN ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1-ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_4 ENDIF
VALUES "ConWidth_4" RANGE [0.001, ConWidth_1-0.001]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_3" THEN ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_3 PARAMETERS ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_4 ENDIF
ConPosY_4 = ConWidth_1/2-ConWidth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_4 = ConPosY_4
IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_5 THEN ConPosZ_4 = -ConDepth_1/2+ConDepth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4 = ConPosZ_4 ENDIF IF typeID = CONNTYPE_ID_6 THEN ConPosZ_4 = ConDepth_1/2-ConDepth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4 = ConPosZ_4 ENDIF ENDIF
ConLength_4 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_4 = ConLength_4 ConPosX_4 = MEP_StraightLength-ConLength_4 PARAMETERS ConPosX_4 = ConPosX_4
LOCK "ConStatus_4" ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_4, ConPosY = ConPosY_4, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_4, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, gs_ui = gs_ui, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[4][1] = STR(ConToolType_4, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[4][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[4][3] = "0"
1000:
FOR k = 1 TO 4 FOR i = 1 TO 9 j = 1+INT((i-0.5)/3) IF i < 4 THEN ad = MEP_Position[1][i] MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = outCoords[j+3*(k-1)][i-3*(j-1)]+ad PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
IF SetProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ELSE
! ------------------- ! ! --- calculation --- ! ! ------------------- !
calcLength = MEP_StraightLength gs_list_area = (ConWidth_1 + ConDepth_1)*2*calcLength PARAMETERS gs_list_area = gs_list_area ENDIF
Symbol.Comment: Фитинг встраиваемого воздуховода с различными типами сечений, с дополнительной изоляцией и фланцем.
